testcase.name: ECommerce login with valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given provide the url of ecommerce "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login".passed When input the email address "admin@yourstore.com" and password "admin".....passed When click on Log in button.................................................passed Then verfiy the title as "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"...........passed When click on logout button.................................................passed
